snippet: Brad Keselowski raced to an impressive victory in the opening race of the Chase for the Sprint Cup, outdueling the five-time champion Jimmie Johnson on Sunday at Chicagoland Speedway in Joliet, Ill.
abstract: Nascar driver Brad Keselowski wins the Geico 400, the opening race of the Chase for the Sprint Cup; other auto racing news noted.
lead_paragraph: Brad Keselowski raced to an impressive victory in the opening race of the Chase for the Sprint Cup, outdueling the five-time champion Jimmie Johnson on Sunday at Chicagoland Speedway in Joliet, Ill.

headline.main: Keselowski Wins First Race of Chase
headline.print_headline: Keselowski Wins First Race of Chase
